targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_idle") AS "Idle", mean("cpu_iowait"), mean("cpu_sys"), mean("cpu_usr") FROM "weatherflow_system_stats" WHERE ("host_hostname" = 'docker02.tylephony.com') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host_hostname" fill(previous)
